name: flame
description: Flame is a personal dashboard for managing links and monitoring self-hosted services. It supports dynamic links, icons, widgets, and a sleek UI that works well as a browser homepage for homelab and server environments.
features: Dashboard: Personal homepage for services, Link management, Dynamic widgets. Central hub for your homelab.
Service Monitoring: Track self-hosted apps. Live status updates.
Customization: Icons, themes, and layouts. Personalized experience.
Browser Homepage: Perfect as your default page. Quick access to everything.
Categories: Organize links by type. Structured navigation.
Search: Find services quickly. Efficient access.
Weather Widget: Display local conditions. Useful information.
Bookmarks: Save favorite links. Quick shortcuts.
Docker Integration: Auto-discover services. Smart detection.
